title: Mordekaiser
body: RIOT instead of creating new champions or new skins , when will you rework mordekaiser? Is also impossible to use it now ... he isn't tanky ..... doesn't do dmg and the heal is too low.... PLS have mercy of this champ

replies.body:
First: this is the Italian forum, english speaking forum is the other one.
second: Mordekaiser has 49.3% winrate all around (with 51.9% in the adcarry role, in this patch & 50.4% midlane) so maybe ur timing is not the best to say that is impossible to use it now :D
non lo usa quasi nessuno , e se si usa non si può carryare per i motivi che ho già citato . Il suo winrate non è affidabile relativamente alla realtà
